decisions.title: Created .github/copilot-instructions.md
decisions.detail: Generated comprehensive AI agent onboarding guide covering architecture, patterns, scoring rules, and development workflows

decisions.title: Adjusted Done button spacing
decisions.detail: Increased marginTop from 44 to 64px in atlas-results.tsx for better breathing room

decisions.title: Improved score section spacing
decisions.detail: Wrapped score label and number in scoreSection with marginTop 24px for better vertical spacing

decisions.title: Enhanced checkmark animation
decisions.detail: Improved scale range to 0.3-1.0, added bounce easing, 200ms delay, and better timing for smoother animation

decisions.title: Fixed checkmark circle visibility
decisions.detail: Changed circle dimensions from percentage to fixed 90px and added shadows for better visual presence

decisions.title: Simplified results header
decisions.detail: Removed header with Results title and back arrow for cleaner, minimal design

decisions.title: Increased animation size
decisions.detail: Made checkmark animation 50% larger, changing dimensions from 90x90 to 135x135 pixels for better visibility

decisions.title: Slowed animation timing
decisions.detail: Increased animation duration by 30% from 900ms to 1170ms for a more relaxed, appreciable success moment

decisions.title: Unified checkmark color
decisions.detail: Replaced Lottie animation with custom checkmark using correct answer green (#437F76) for visual consistency

decisions.title: Restored Lottie animation with correct color
decisions.detail: Fixed broken animation by restoring LottieView while keeping correct green background color, reduced size to 110px

decisions.title: Fixed double green circle issue
decisions.detail: Removed background checkCircle view, keeping only Lottie animation to eliminate duplicate green backgrounds

decisions.title: Pure custom animation with correct color
decisions.detail: Replaced Lottie with custom animated checkmark using #437F76, removed delay for immediate start

decisions.title: Restored Lottie with color filtering
decisions.detail: Brought back full Lottie animation with colorFilters to change green to #437F76 while preserving all animation effects

decisions.title: Simplified Lottie with colorFilters only
decisions.detail: Removed background overlay to restore checkmark visibility, relying only on Lottie colorFilters for color change

decisions.title: Added checkmark overlay
decisions.detail: Overlaid custom white checkmark on top of Lottie animation to ensure visibility while keeping animation effects

decisions.title: Made checkmark overlay animated
decisions.detail: Synchronized checkmark with main animation using same scale and opacity transforms for smooth unified animation

decisions.title: Switched to Check.json animation
decisions.detail: Replaced completed.json with Check.json which has correct green color built-in, removed overlays and colorFilters

decisions.title: Removed animation delay
decisions.detail: Eliminated 200ms delay from animation sequence for immediate start when results screen loads

decisions.title: Fixed double animation glitch
decisions.detail: Removed Lottie trigger from animation callback and set autoPlay=true to prevent double animation starts

decisions.title: Fixed button repositioning issue
decisions.detail: Added buttonContainer and buttonPlaceholder to reserve space and prevent content shifting when Done button appears

decisions.title: Fixed letter box positioning
decisions.detail: Made missing letters input boxes absolutely positioned lower on screen with fixed position for better UX

decisions.title: Adjusted letter box height
decisions.detail: Moved letter boxes higher by changing bottom position from 120 to 180 pixels

decisions.title: Moved letter boxes much higher
decisions.detail: Changed bottom position from 180 to 280 pixels for better screen positioning

decisions.title: Moved clue text lower
decisions.detail: Added marginTop: 40 to header section to position clue text lower on screen

decisions.title: Story Exercise Modal Redesign
decisions.detail: Completely redesigned customize story modal with centered layout, reduced padding/margins, smaller option pills (12px/6px padding, 16px borderRadius), and compact 380px maxWidth for better UX

decisions.title: Made exercise names clickable
decisions.detail: Added TouchableOpacity wrapper around exercise names in atlas-practice-integrated.tsx with onPress handler to setCurrentPhase(index) for direct navigation to any exercise

decisions.title: Added exercise name touch targets
decisions.detail: Created exerciseNameTouchable style with paddingVertical: 8, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 8 for better touch targets and user experience

decisions.title: Replaced Basic Needs & Family word set
decisions.detail: Updated all 5 words in levels.ts with new comprehensive vocabulary: shelter, nourishment, sibling, relative, companion - each with detailed definitions, natural examples, phonetics, and synonyms

decisions.title: Updated MCQ distractors for topic relevance
decisions.detail: Replaced generic MCQ incorrect options with family/needs-themed distractors in mcq.tsx: danger/illness/absence/conflict (opposite), building/trust/connected/healthy (similar), activities/education/transportation/technology (unrelated) - all with similar word counts

decisions.title: Updated sentence usage exercises
decisions.detail: Replaced all 5 sentence-usage items in sentence-usage.tsx with new words: shelter, nourishment, sibling, relative, companion - each with 4 contextually appropriate sentences (1 correct, 3 incorrect with similar structure)

decisions.title: Updated synonym exercises
decisions.detail: Replaced all 5 synonym items in synonym.tsx with new words and topic-relevant options: shelter (protection/housing/refuge vs danger/exposure), nourishment (nutrition/sustenance vs hunger/illness), sibling/relative/companion with family-themed correct and incorrect pools

decisions.title: Simplified words to A1 beginner level
decisions.detail: Replaced all 5 words in Basic Needs & Family with simpler A1 vocabulary: home, food, brother, family, friend - using simple definitions (7-9 words), natural examples with basic grammar, and everyday synonyms suitable for absolute beginners

decisions.title: Updated all exercises for A1 level
decisions.detail: Simplified MCQ distractors, sentence-usage items, and synonym pools in all components to use basic A1 vocabulary and simple sentence structures that absolute beginners can understand

decisions.title: Created A1 words for Education & Work
decisions.detail: Added 5 new A1 beginner level words in levels.ts for set 3: teacher, book, job, write, help - with simple definitions (8-10 words), natural examples using basic grammar, phonetics, and everyday synonyms suitable for absolute beginners

decisions.title: Created 10 new A1 beginner word sets
decisions.detail: Added 50 A1 level words across 10 new topics in levels.ts: Food & Cooking (cook, eat, drink, taste, hungry), Free Time & Hobbies (play, music, watch, read, dance), Technology & Internet (computer, phone, internet, video, game), Shopping & Money (buy, money, shop, price, pay), Health & Body (doctor, sick, body, pain, healthy), Weather & Nature (sun, rain, tree, cold, hot), Emotions & Personality (happy, sad, angry, kind, smart), Transportation & Travel (car, bus, walk, travel, ticket), Home & Furniture (room, table, chair, bed, door), Culture & Entertainment (movie, song, party, art, story)

decisions.title: Updated SetCard icon mapping for new topics
decisions.detail: Added icon recognition in SetCard.tsx for all 10 new topics: food-cooking.png, free-time-hobbies.png, technology-internet.png, shopping-money.png, health-body.png, weather-nature.png, emotions-personality.png, transportation-travel.png, home-furniture.png, culture-entertainment.png

decisions.title: Built Quiz 1 with 10 words
decisions.detail: Added 10 A1 words to Quiz 1 in levels.ts from sets 2 & 3: home, food, brother, family, friend (from Basic Needs & Family) + teacher, book, job, write, help (from Education & Work). Quiz now has full word content for exercises

decisions.title: Implemented custom quiz exercise flow
decisions.detail: Modified atlas-practice-integrated.tsx to detect quiz type (type: 'quiz') and use custom phase structure: no Intro, only MCQ -> Synonym -> Usage -> Letters (4 phases instead of 5). Used useMemo to detect quiz type and conditionally set phases array

decisions.title: Fixed quiz navigation
decisions.detail: Updated learn.tsx to route quiz sets to atlas-practice-integrated instead of quiz-screen. Removed the conditional check for set.type === 'quiz' so both regular sets and quizzes use the same integrated practice component which now handles both cases

decisions.title: Implemented word range splitting for quizzes
decisions.detail: Added wordRange prop { start, end } to MCQ, Synonym, and Usage components. In atlas-practice-integrated.tsx, quizzes now split 10 words: MCQ & Synonym get words 0-4 (first 5), Usage & Letters get words 5-9 (next 5). Updated MCQ and Synonym to dynamically pull words from levels.ts and apply wordRange filter

decisions.title: Fixed Sentence Usage to use dynamic words
decisions.detail: Made sentence-usage.tsx pull words from levels.ts instead of hardcoded ITEMS. Now applies wordRange filter so Usage exercise shows correct word set (words 5-9 for quizzes). Updated all ITEMS.length references to itemsData.length

decisions.title: Fixed Synonym to show 6 options with 3 correct
decisions.detail: Updated synonym.tsx to always show 6 options: 3 correct synonyms and 3 incorrect options. Changed requiredCount from dynamic (entry.correct.length) to fixed value of 3. Modified options generation to slice first 3 correct and 3 incorrect options

decisions.title: Added 3rd synonym to all Quiz 1 words
decisions.detail: Updated all 10 words in Quiz 1 (levels.ts) to have 3 synonyms each instead of 2: home (where you live), food (lunch), brother (boy in family), family (mom and dad), friend (someone you like), teacher (tutor), book (novel), job (career), write (pen), help (aid)

decisions.title: Added synonym data for words 6-10
decisions.detail: Extended WORDS array in synonym.tsx to include teacher, book, job, write, help with their correct synonyms and incorrect options. This ensures the second set of 5 words (used in quiz) has proper synonym data for the exercise

decisions.title: Fixed Quiz 1 to use words from Sets 1 & 2
decisions.detail: Replaced Quiz 1 words in levels.ts to use 5 from Set 1 (Daily Routines: wake up, eat, study, exercise, sleep) and 5 from Set 2 (Basic Needs & Family: home, food, brother, family, friend). Updated description to 'A quick recap of sets 1 & 2'. Added 3rd synonym to all words

decisions.title: Updated synonym and usage components for new quiz words
decisions.detail: Updated WORDS array in synonym.tsx to include Set 1 words (wake up, eat, study, exercise, sleep) with 3 synonyms and incorrect options each. Updated ITEMS array in sentence-usage.tsx to include all 10 quiz words with appropriate sentence examples

decisions.title: Added Quiz 2, 3, 4, and 5
decisions.detail: Created 4 new quizzes following the same pattern: Quiz 2 (sets 3&4: teacher,book,job,write,help,cook,eat,drink,taste,hungry), Quiz 3 (sets 5&6: play,music,watch,read,dance,computer,phone,internet,video,game), Quiz 4 (sets 7&8: buy,money,shop,price,pay,doctor,sick,body,pain,healthy), Quiz 5 (sets 9&10: sun,rain,tree,cold,hot,happy,sad,angry,kind,smart). All with 3 synonyms each for the synonym exercise

decisions.title: Reorganized quizzes to appear after every 2 sets
decisions.detail: Restructured levels.ts so quizzes appear immediately after their corresponding sets: Set1,Set2,Quiz1,Set3,Set4,Quiz2,Set5,Set6,Quiz3,Set7,Set8,Quiz4,Set9,Set10,Quiz5,Set11,Set12,Set13. This provides natural progression and review points for learners

decisions.title: Implemented quiz locking mechanism
decisions.detail: Added logic to lock quizzes until the previous 2 sets are completed. Modified learn.tsx to check completion status of previous sets and add 'locked' property to quiz sets. Updated SetCard.tsx to display locked state with gray styling, lock icon, disabled interaction, and 'Complete previous sets' message. Users cannot start a quiz until they finish the 2 sets before it

decisions.title: Extended locking to all sets (sequential progression)
decisions.detail: Updated learn.tsx to lock ALL sets (not just quizzes) until the previous set is completed. First set is always unlocked. Each subsequent set requires completion of the immediately previous set. Changed message to 'Complete previous set first'. This creates a linear learning path where users must complete sets in order

decisions.title: Added 3rd synonym to all regular sets
decisions.detail: Updated all 13 regular sets in levels.ts to have 3 synonyms per word instead of 2. This ensures the synonym exercise shows 6 options (3 correct + 3 incorrect) for both regular sets and quizzes. Sets updated: Daily Routines, Basic Needs & Family, Education & Work, Food & Cooking, Free Time & Hobbies, Technology & Internet, Shopping & Money, Health & Body, Weather & Nature, Emotions & Personality, Transportation & Travel, Home & Furniture, Culture & Entertainment

decisions.title: Created IELTS Vocabulary level
decisions.detail: Added complete IELTS level with 20 sets covering essential IELTS topics: Academic Life, Environment & Climate, Technology & Innovation, Health & Medicine, Business & Economics, Government & Politics, Media & Communication, Social Issues, Arts & Culture, Science & Research, Travel & Tourism, Food & Agriculture, Urban Development, Education System, Crime & Law, Psychology & Behavior, Global Issues, Sports & Fitness, Finance & Banking, Employment & Career. Each set contains 5 words (100 total) at B2-C1 CEFR level with academic definitions, example sentences, phonetics, and 3 synonyms each

decisions.title: Added IELTS topic icon recognition
decisions.detail: Updated SetCard.tsx to recognize and display appropriate icons for all 20 IELTS topics. Icon mapping includes academic-life.png, environment-climate.png, technology-innovation.png, health-medicine.png, business-economics.png, government-politics.png, media-communication.png, social-issues.png, culture.png, science-research.png, travel-tourism.png, food-agriculture.png, urban-development.png, education-system.png, crime-law.png, psychology-behavior.png, global-issues.png, sports-fitness.png, finance-banking.png, employment-career.png

decisions.title: Fixed icon conflict for Food & Agriculture
decisions.detail: Reordered icon mapping logic in SetCard.tsx to check for 'food && agriculture' before 'arts || culture' to prevent Food & Agriculture from incorrectly displaying the Arts & Culture icon

decisions.title: Improved locked set visibility
decisions.detail: Enhanced styling for locked sets in SetCard.tsx: increased container opacity from 0.6 to 0.85, lightened background from #1F1F1F to #252525, increased icon opacity from 0.4 to 0.6, and changed text color from #888 to #A0A0A0 for better readability while maintaining locked appearance

decisions.title: Implemented topic-based MCQ distractors
decisions.detail: Created comprehensive getTopicDistracts() function in mcq.tsx with topic-specific incorrect options for all 13 beginner sets (Daily Routines, Family, Education, Food, Hobbies, Technology, Shopping, Health, Weather, Emotions, Transportation, Home, Culture). Each topic has 3-5 opposite, similar, and unrelated distractors that are contextually relevant to the topic, making questions more challenging and natural. Generic fallback provided for unlisted topics

decisions.title: Added comprehensive synonym incorrect pools
decisions.detail: Expanded WORDS array in synonym.tsx from 10 to 65 words covering all 13 regular sets (325 words total with 5 per set). Each word now has 5-6 topic-related incorrect options that are contextually appropriate, making the synonym matching exercise more challenging and realistic. Incorrect options are semantically related but clearly wrong (e.g., for 'wake up': sleep, rest, nap, slumber, doze)

decisions.title: Added IELTS topic-based MCQ distractors
decisions.detail: Extended getTopicDistracts() function in mcq.tsx to include all 20 IELTS topics with academic-level distractors: Academic Life, Environment & Climate, Technology & Innovation, Health & Medicine, Business & Economics, Government & Politics, Media & Communication, Social Issues, Arts & Culture, Science & Research, Travel & Tourism, Food & Agriculture, Urban Development, Education System, Crime & Law, Psychology & Behavior, Global Issues, Sports & Fitness, Finance & Banking, Employment & Career. Each has topic-specific opposite, similar, and unrelated options at B2-C1 level

decisions.title: Added IELTS synonym incorrect pools
decisions.detail: Extended WORDS array in synonym.tsx from 65 to 165 words by adding all 100 IELTS vocabulary words across 20 sets. Each word has 5-6 academically appropriate incorrect options that are contextually related to the topic (e.g., for 'pollution': purification, cleanliness, freshness, purity, sanitation). Incorrect options use B2-C1 level vocabulary to match the IELTS standard and provide challenging but fair distractors

decisions.title: Story Exercise redesign
decisions.detail: Paper-style reading card with serif typography and larger text; compact Tools dock with gear toggle; light/dark theme toggle works correctly.

decisions.title: Word picker and SRS-aware improvements
decisions.detail: Full-screen picker modal with shorter instructions and tighter chips; Auto-pick 5 aligns on same row and wraps; Added Recommended/Due/Weak/All filters and Auto-pick prioritizes due/weak/recent.

decisions.title: Placement Test flow
decisions.detail: 30-question adaptive flow (A1â†’B2 every 5), early stop after 3 mistakes, result page ties into Learn; diversified question bank (definition/synonym/antonym) with better distractors and optional context; results saved to analytics and recommended level set automatically.

decisions.title: Analytics depth and sync
decisions.detail: Added SRS health snapshot, weak words, topic breakdown, time-of-day accuracy, recommendations; analytics tied to Supabase for cross-device sync.

decisions.title: UI polish
decisions.detail: Story blanks match body size; Tools dock spacing adjusted; panel margins tuned to avoid header overlap.

style.detail: Update .github/copilot-instructions.md when architectural patterns or critical rules change to keep AI agents current
